entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming east 20 km/h near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
